decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (P-1003 Revision A, P-1004 Revision A, P-2006 Revision A and Location Plan. Received 02/03/2016. P-2003 Revision B and P-2004 Revision B. Received 12/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of rear roof extensions with insertion of additional roof windows and creation of a balcony to the house
